description:
Yuuto is invited to the World’s Maid and Butler Union’s year-end party. Yuuto had been registered with the Union after he had worked as a butler at the Tennouji House. The event hall, Nogizaka House, is alive with maids and butlers. Hazuki and Nanami have to work as a party host, so Alice must escort Yuuto. Alice tries hard to be hospitable to Yuuto, but has a hard time doing so. Meanwhile, Yuuto wins the toy that Alice wanted during the bingo game, and gives it to her as a present. It makes Alice very happy, but…
Source: crunchyroll
